title: Weekly Roundup: Friday, March 11
description: In the wake of Tuesday's primaries, both parties held debates this week. A look at what's really left to learn from them, some listener questions, and can't let it go. This episode: campaign reporter Sam Sanders, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, editor/correspondent Ron Elving, and congressional correspondent Susan Davis.  Find the team on Twitter, at nprpolitics@npr.org, or email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
